Author: nintentions
Text: i wish i could purge too. whenever i do i can only get the tiniest bit out after hacking and gagging and slobbering for 20+ mins.... but then sometimes i look at the state of myself afterwards - bloated, an aching, puffy, blotchy face and swollen eyes - and i’m almost glad that i’m not capable of fully purging because like a lot of people say here, it’s a horrible downward spiral.
